comments:
I was installing the SDK using the admin ui with the download in the background and it seems that every time I click on the status button at the bottom an NPE happens

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2007-11-02 20:54:28.743

were you running from HEAD (where the progress view now comes up), or from a build?
sorry, should have said.  I was running M3 binary from the download site.
